mapper.select:
select from tb_natmeha_doctor
and (DOCTOR_TITLE like "%"#{tbNatmehaDoctor.neirou}"%" or DOCTOR_NAME like "%"#{tbNatmehaDoctor.neirou}"%" or DOCTOR_TREATMENT like "%"#{tbNatmehaDoctor.neirou}"%" or NUM_TYPE like "%"#{tbNatmehaDoctor.neirou}"%")
order by itemcreateat desc

SELECT d.itemID, d.itemCode, d.DOCTOR_NAME, d.DOCTOR_TITLE, d.DOCTOR_TREATMENT, d.DOCTOR_SORCE, d.DEPT_CODE, d.NUM_TYPE, d.USER_CODE, d.CREATER, d.itemCreateAt, d.UPDATER, d.itemUpdateAt, f.itemID f_itemID, f.itemCode f_itemCode, f.DATA_CODE f_dataCode, f.FILE_NAME f_fileName FROM natmeha.tb_natmeha_doctor d left join natmeha.tb_natmeha_file f on d.itemCode = f.DATA_CODE WHERE d.itemID = #{itemid}
mapper.update:
update tb_natmeha_doctor
DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_TITLE = #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_TYPE = #{numType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_TREATMENT = #{doctorTreatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into itemCode, DOCTOR_NAME, DOCTOR_TITLE, DOCTOR_TREATMENT, DOCTOR_SORCE, DEPT_CODE, NUM_TYPE, USER_CODE, CREATER, UPDATER, ORG_CODE values (#{itemcode}, #{doctorName}, #{doctorTitle}, #{doctorTreatment}, #{doctorSorce}, #{deptCode}, #{numType}, #{userCode}, #{creater}, #{updater}, #{orgCode})

insert into tb_natmeha_doctor (itemCode, DOCTOR_NAME, DOCTOR_TITLE, DOCTOR_TREATMENT, DOCTOR_SORCE, DEPT_CODE, NUM_TYPE, USER_CODE, CREATER, itemCreateAt, UPDATER, itemUpdateAt, ORG_CODE) values (#{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorTreatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorSorce,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{numType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into tb_natmeha_doctor
itemCode,
DOCTOR_NAME,
DOCTOR_TITLE,
DOCTOR_TREATMENT,
DOCTOR_SORCE,
DEPT_CODE,
NUM_TYPE,
USER_CODE,
CREATER,
itemCreateAt,
UPDATER,
itemUpdateAt,
ORG_CODE,

mapper.update:
update tb_natmeha_doctor
DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_TITLE = #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_TREATMENT = #{doctorTreatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOCTOR_SORCE = #{doctorSorce,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NUM_TYPE = #{numType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tb_natmeha_doctor set DOCTOR_NAME = #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_TITLE = #{doctorTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_TREATMENT = #{doctorTreatment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCTOR_SORCE = #{doctorSorce,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NUM_TYPE = #{numType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemUpdateAt = #{itemupdateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode,jdbcType=CHAR} where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
